nodes.body: From Labrang (bla brang) northwest up to the lake things become very complex as the area is a patchwork of Mongols, Salar, Mongour and Hui mixed with Tibetans (who are often the most dominant). This areaâ€™s true nature and subdivisions requires considerable research, and especially networking with people expert of local areas.
nodes.title: Brief Overview of Labrang
